coreAttributes.name: Desert Ambrosia
coreAttributes.description: A glass jug, filled with a thick, warm, aromatic and golden brew. The front has an engraving of a jackal in Egyptian garb having her breasts fondled by none other than Anubis, her teats leaking a golden brew for the denizens of the underworld to lap off of her hide in sensual fashion.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

[npc.name] [npc.verb(feel)] [npc.her] body heat up in response to the alcoholic beverage.

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_DAMAGE_LUST, 5)] [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.25)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(remove)] the alcohlic substance from [npc.her] inventory. After pouring it into a glass, [npc.she] [npc.verb(start)] drinking, the warm stuff gliding down [npc.her] throat, leaving a fuzzy feeling on [npc.her] mind. The alcohol has a unique, honeyed taste that leaves [npc.her] body wanting more.
